#summary Cumulative changelog for MPlayer
#labels Featured
Next release:

  * Synchronized FFmpeg to git 5ed5e90
  * Updated libvpx to 1.2.0

Live555 will be removed in the next release since FFmpeg can handle rtsp://, but they'll need to be prefixed with ffmpeg:// (ex: ffmpeg://rtsp://url.to/stream). Pthreads (pthreadGC2.dll) have also been made static, no longer requiring the pthread dll.

r**35712:

  * Synchronized MPlayer to svn r**35712
  * Synchronized FFmpeg to git 9a74282

This build fixes ASS/SSA subtitle corruption.

  * Synchronized FFmpeg to git b367453

r**35710:

  * Synchronized MPlayer to svn r**35710
  * Synchronized FFmpeg to git ec40d15
  * Updated Live555 to 12.24.2012

This release fixes a "Ran out of numbered images" crash when seeking in H.264 files.

r**35701:

  * Synchronized MPlayer to svn r**35701

A patch in libdvdnav (r**1245) was reversed, which caused inability to play any DVDs using dvdnav://.
